0.text: Innate: Periodically, upon taking  fatal damage, Anivia enters  resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her  health.
0.html: Innate: Periodically, upon taking fatal damage, Anivia enters resurrection for 6 seconds and restores all of her  health.
markedPassages: fatal damage
resurrection
health

1.text: While under resurrection, Anivia is  unable to act and gains -40 − 20 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
1.html: While under resurrection, Anivia is unable to act and gains -40 − 20 (based on level)  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance.
markedPassages: unable to act
bonus armor
bonus magic resistance

2.text: If Anivia remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her current health.
2.html: If Anivia remains alive by the end of the duration, she is revived with her current health.

0.text: Active: Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and  slows them by 20% − 40% (based on  Glacial Storm's Rank) for 3 seconds.
0.html: Active: Anivia launches a chunk of ice in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit and slows them by 20% − 40% (based on Glacial Storm's Rank) for 3 seconds.
markedPassages: slows
20% − 40% (based on Glacial Storm's Rank)

1.text: Flash Frost can be recast while the ice is in flight after its cast time, and does so automatically at maximum range.
1.html: Flash Frost can be recast while the ice is in flight after its cast time, and does so automatically at maximum range.

2.text: Recast: Anivia shatters the ice, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, as well as refreshing the  slow.
2.html: Recast: Anivia shatters the ice, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and stunning them for a duration, as well as refreshing the slow.
markedPassages: stunning
slow

0.text: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing,  knocking all units away from it, though not through terrain. The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Anivia summons a wall of ice at the target location perpendicular to her facing, knocking all units away from it, though not through terrain. The wall lingers as impassable terrain for 5 seconds.
markedPassages: knocking

0.text: Passive: Enemies hit by  Flash Frost or a fully formed  Glacial Storm become Chilled for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
0.html: Passive: Enemies hit by Flash Frost or a fully formed Glacial Storm become Chilled for 3 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits.
markedPassages: Flash Frost
Glacial Storm

1.text: Active: Anivia blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy that deals magic damage,  doubled if they were Chilled.
1.html: Active: Anivia blasts a freezing wind at the target enemy that deals magic damage, doubled if they were Chilled.

0.text: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.
0.html: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.
markedPassages: slowing

1.text: The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm is empowered to deal 300% damage and increase the effectiveness of its slow by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds.
1.html: The blizzard increases in size over 1.5 seconds. At maximum size, Glacial Storm is empowered to deal 300% damage and increase the effectiveness of its slow by 50%, which also instead lasts 1.5 seconds and refreshes every 0.25 seconds.

2.text: Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if Anivia is no longer in range or unable to pay the  mana cost, or becomes affected by any form of  interrupting  crowd control.
2.html: Glacial Storm can be recast after 1 second, and does so automatically if Anivia is no longer in range or unable to pay the  mana cost, or becomes affected by any form of interrupting crowd control.
markedPassages: mana
interrupting
crowd control

3.text: Recast: Anivia ends Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.
3.html: Recast: Anivia ends Glacial Storm, dealing one last tick of damage.

0.concerningText: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.

st_flatStats2.concerningText: Recast: Anivia shatters the ice, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  stunning them for a duration, as well as refreshing the  slow.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Anivia calls forth a driving rain of ice and hail at the target location, dealing magic damage every 0.5 seconds to enemies within and  slowing them for 1 second, refreshing every 0.5 seconds while they remain inside.
